summary: A test suite that verifies the correct composition of directed acyclic graph representations of quantum circuits under a wide range of scenarios, including calibration data, classical register merging, conditional and loop constructs, expressionâ€‘based conditions, target specifications, and various node ordering permutations.
business_intent: To ensure the robustness and correctness of DAGCircuit composition in the Qiskit framework, preventing regressions and guaranteeing that quantum and classical control flow, as well as calibration information, are preserved when combining circuit DAGs.
